InstructionData.Title: SMARTSUIT
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
define MINO2PP 25 define MINPRESEXT 20 define MAXTEMP 323.15
alias Helmet d0 alias Jetpack d1
alias pressure r0 alias ppo2 r1 alias ratioo2 r2 alias open r3 alias extpres r4 alias presbad r5 alias tempbad r6 alias exttemp r7 alias hazard r9
loop: l pressure db Pressure l ratioo2 db RatioOxygen mul ppo2 ratioo2 pressure slt open ppo2 MINO2PP s db Filtration open
l open Helmet Open beqz open done l extpres db PressureExternal slt presbad extpres MINPRESEXT
l exttemp db TemperatureExternal sgt tempbad exttemp MAXTEMP
or hazard presbad tempbad beqal hazard 1 closehelm
done: yield j loop
closehelm: s Helmet Open 0 j ra
